Title: The Road Trip
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Brigitte Liebowitz, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor), Matt O'Brien (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake and Amy have a case early in the morning, so they stay at a hotel overnight. Jake invites Sophia and Amy's boyfriend not knowing that Amy is planning on breaking up with him.
